participant_1.name: Mike
participant_1.personality: Reflective and dedicated, Mike has a creative spirit shaped by his experiences as a single dad.
participant_1.background: whats up i'm a 46 year old single dad 46 a kids. my ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. i prefer being inside. i live in california but the recording artist market was dead last year. i am a recording engineer and own my own studio.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and health-conscious, Emily loves the outdoors and enjoys trying new coffee brews.
participant_2.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. i am a huge coffee lover. i don't drink alcohol. my father was a construction worker.

content.text: Hey! Do you prefer being inside?
